name: is_a_ts
description: Typescript implementation of is_a/2, inherited from Ram Lottem's work

scripts.clean: rimraf -f build && mkdir build && cd build && mkdir typescript && mkdir rollup && mkdir terser && cd ../src/ts && rimraf -f generated_code && mkdir generated_code && cd ../..
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run version && npm run typescript && npm run rollup

author: John Haugeland <stonecypher@gmail.com>
